parsed.recap:
DEV: Village of Lisle destroyed—Rance's latent Mage-Gift awakened catastrophically during bandit raid, obliterating village; Karsites disguised as bandits captured villagers for suspected blood magic/demon summoning; red robes found hidden under bandit clothing, organized infiltration to Menmellith border; Senta Chose Rance, bond formed, stabilizing wild Gift; delivered to Haven, reported to Circle; confirmed first Mage-Gift since Vanyel; complete mind-merge with Talia during memory recovery—Rance now possesses all Queen's Own memories/knowledge/training, she has his trauma; Circle ordered archives search for Mage-Gift training, discreet diplomatic inquiries to Karse's neighbors, Rance quartered at remote Healer's cottage, information sealed to Circle only, official cover as ordinary trainee; Rance and Senta settled into isolated cottage; Talia resolved to propose major plan to Selenay regarding shared memories situation.

PEND: Court power structure threatened by two people holding Queen's Own knowledge; no living teachers for Mage-Gift; Rance's specific Gift type unidentified but devastatingly powerful; uncontrolled Gift poses assassination risk to Valdemaran leadership; Karsite blood magic intent unknown; Talia's plan for Selenay unspecified; Alberich's potential training approach uncertain.
